main event: A witness reported seeing an unidentified flying object in Middletown, Orange County, N.Y., in November 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3-5 seconds.,The object was described as about the size of a jet aircraft with a bright light on the front that was flashing or pulsing.,The object stood still for about 2 minutes before dashing away at a rapid speed.,The weather conditions were described as bright during daylight, and the sun was to the left of the witness.,The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the object labeled with a date, suggesting it was an unusual sighting.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling a rotating disc
